section1.title: List your own venue or book your desired venue with our mobile app.
section1.subtitle: Download Now

join-us.title: Are you a venue owner?
join-us.subtitle: Join our growing list of venues listed in our mobile application, manage your customer bookings and be exposed to broader market.

our-aim.title: Our Aim
our-aim.subtitle1: Reducing the hassle for choosing the best venue suited for your activity and event.
our-aim.subtitle2: Most of the time we spent hours searching for the right venue for our leisure and special event. We have to make numerous phone calls to check the availability, pricing and amenities offered at the venue.
our-aim.subtitle3: We aim to reduce this gap so that venue booking is a lot easier for the user. We also aim to increase market access for venue owners, while continuously support digitalization of venue and facility management.

section1.title: Get Started
section1.step-1: Download and launch Venue: app. Here is the link for
section1.step-2: Sign up as Venue Owner. Prepare your NRIC and company SSM certificate.
section1.step-3: Start creating your venue and fill in the details required. Prepare nice photos to upload.
section1.step-4: Wait for your venue verification (1 - 3 days)
section1.step-5: Inform your customer so they book your venue through the app!
